colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B (CES DMIGS RIM 'GA' ZHIG GI GNAD KHYAD PA CAN BLO YI MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SKAL LDAN RNAMS LA PHAN SRID SNYAM PA'I SEMS KYI KUN NAS SLAD STE, ^SPRULo SKUo AERo TEo NIo MKHANo POo SHRIo GEo THUo MERo GENo NOMo CHIo NOo YONo CHOSo RJEo ZHES YONGS SU GRAGS PA 'DI @018A *, ,NYID KYI BKA' DRIN GYIS CUNG ZAD NYE BAR 'TSO BA, BTZUN GZUGS THA SHAL BA, DGE SLONG GI GZUGS CAN DGE BSHES SU 'BOD PA, PHYOGS MED DU 'KHYAMS ZHING SMYON PA'I RTUL BZHUGS 'DZIN PA SBYIN PA DAR RGYAS MING CHANG BAS BRIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BDAG SOGS 'GRO BA KUN, NYON MONGS GA-YUL LAS RAB TU RGYAL, ,MTHAR THUG RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI, GO 'PHANG DAM PA THOB PAR SHOG , ,,)
